Change Log
===========

1.0.0 (21/05/2021)
------------------
- First Release

1.0.1 (09/06/2021)
------------------
- Small correction

1.0.2 (15/06/2021)
------------------
- Small correction

1.1.0 (23/07/2021)
------------------
- Adding new scripts for syringe movement and velocity speed
  -> syringeMovement(..)
  -> velocityConfiguration(..)
  -> setMaximumMicroStepVelocityPerMinute(..) - used only for PSD smooth flow
- Method definePump is updated, it has a new parameter called 'syringe'
